0.3.0 / 2015-05-12
==================

  * Add weak `ETag` matching support

==================

  * Support Node.js 0.6

==================

  * Move repository to jshttp

==================

==================

  * Fix for blank page on Safari reload

==================

  * Return stale for `Cache-Control: no-cache`
